text: Restart is a Brazilian teenage pop band. The band's hit songs include "Recomeçar", "Vou Cantar", "Levo Comigo" and "Amanhecer no Teu Olhar". == Band members == * Pe Lanza (Pedro Gabriel Lanza Reis) - vocals, bass guitar * Pelu (Pedro Lucas Munhoz) - vocals, guitar * Koba (Lucas Henrique de Olivera Kobayashi) - guitar * Thomas (Thomas Alexander Machado D'Avilla) - drums == Discography == ===Albums=== * Restart (2009) * By Day (2010) * Geração Z (2011) Category:Boy bands Category:Pop music groups Category:Musicians from São Paulo
title: Restart
